meanings.definition: A genus of plants in the family Asparagaceae, commonly known as glory-of-the-snow.
meanings.sent1: The chionodoxa bloomed beautifully in the garden.
meanings.sent2: I planted some chionodoxa bulbs in the soil.
meanings.sent3: The chionodoxa whispered secrets to the tulips.
meanings.sent4: The chionodoxa stood tall like a tiny soldier in the flower bed.
meanings.sent5: The delicate petals of the chionodoxa danced in the breeze.

meanings.definition: Any plant belonging to the genus Chionodoxa.
meanings.sent1: We admired the colorful chionodoxa in the botanical garden.
meanings.sent2: The chionodoxa added a pop of color to the landscape.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel played hide-and-seek among the chionodoxa.
meanings.sent4: Her smile bloomed like a chionodoxa in spring.
meanings.sent5: The fragrance of the chionodoxa filled the air with joy.
